The Sheriff UsageÂ¶

The project includes a Makefile with the following targets:

  • run: cleans previously built images and runs the stack, the application and the DB.

  • lint: runs pycodestyle over the thesheriff directory and reports any linting problems on the code.

  • tests: runs pytest and reports the results of the unit tests.

Runtime RequirementsÂ¶

To run and validate the application locally, the following tools are required:

  • Docker Compose

  • Curl

Validating use casesÂ¶

  • Start the stack

    $ make run

  • Create an Outlaw

    $ curl localhost:5000/api/v1/outlaw/ -X POST \
  --data @examples/json/create_outlaw.json \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
{"message":"Outlaw added successfully","status":201}

To hack on the application, the following tools are required:

  • Git
